document.full_text: police fired tear gas and water cannon sunday at demonstrators protesting against bahrain's royal family in one of the most violent confrontations since troops killed seven protesters last month.
document.title: bahrain protesters block roads, royals push for talks
lines_and_colors: police fired tear gas and water cannon sunday at demonstrators protesting against bahrain's royal family in one of the most violent confrontations since troops killed seven protesters last month.
